titles.title: Mäṣḥafä nәfq “Book of the Assistant Priest” / Ṣalotä ʿәṭan “Prayer of Incense” / Bәsratä Luqas “Gospel of Luke”

shortcontents.shortcontent:
The Ms. contains the following texts: I) Mäṣḥafä nәfq “Book of the Assistant Priest” (fols. 1r-12v, l.14) I-1) Prayer by the assistant priest receiving the host during the Prothesis (fol.1r, l.1-19): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 22-25) I-2) Prayer of oblation (fols. 1, l.19-2r, l.5): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 41-44.) I-3) Fәtḥat zä-wäld “Absolution of the Son” (fols. 2r, l.5-3r, l.15): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 56-60). I-4) General absolution (fols. 3r, l.15-4r, l.16): excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 61-65). I-5) Concluding chant after the reading from the Pauline Epistles (fols. 4r, l.16-5r, l.3): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 132-135). I-6) Excerpt from the Acts of the Apostles, Acts 23:1-11 (fols. 5r, l.3-6r, l.18) I-7) Universal prayer by the assistant priest (fols. 6r, l.18-8r, l.6): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 194-209). I-8) Supplication for peace, the hierarchy and the assembly (fols. 8r, l.7-9r, l.4): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. IV, §§ 15-20). I-9) Prayer of blessing of St. Basil (fols. 9r, l.4-10r, l.19): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 10-21). I-10) Prayer before the congregation receives the Eucharist (fols. 10r, l.19-11r, l.5): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 110-112). I-11) Prayer of intercession following the imposition of the celebrant‘s hand (fols. 11r, l.5-12v, l.14): excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 154-158). II) Ṣalotä ʿәṭan “Prayer of Incense” (fols. 12v, l.14-30r, l.2) II-1) Prayer of Incense – excerpt from the introductory prayers (Bä-sälam ʾәmḫabä ʾәgziʾabәḥer ʾab…) (fols. 12v, l.14-14r, l.1) II-2) Prayer of Incense - Prayer of offering incense (Täwäkkäf ʾәgziʾo ʾәṭanänä…) (fols. 14r, l.1-14v, l.9) II-3) Supplication for offering the incense (Nәsʾәl wä-nastäbäqwәʾ ḫirutä śänayatikä ʾәgziʾo…) (fols. 14v, l.9-15r, l.10) II-4) Undefined Prayer of incense (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer ʿabiy wәʾәtu lä-ʿaläm bä-qädami zä-ʾiyäḫallәq…) (fols. 15r, l.10-16r, l.14) II-5) Prayer of offering incense (Täwäkkäf ʾәgziʾo ʾәmneyä ʾanä ḫaṭʾә wäʾabasi zäntä ʿәṭan…) (fols. 16r, l.14-16v, l.1) II-6) Prayer of Incense - Supplication for offering the incense (Nәsʾәläkkä ʾәgziʾo wä-nastäbäqwәʾ ʾamlakәna bäkämä śämärkä qwәrbanä ʾabel…) (fol. 16v, l.1-16v, l.15) II-7) Monitions (fols. 16v, l.15-17r, l.13) II-8) Benediction (Ṣägga zä-ʾab ḫirut zä-wäld sutafe zä-mänfäs täfaqro…) (fols. 17r, l.13-17v, l.3) II-9) Prayer for the hierarchy (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer yähabo lä-bәḍuʿ wäläqәddus liqa ṗaṗasat…) (fols. 17v, l.3-18r, l.13) II-10) Prayer of offering incense (ʾAbäwәʿ läkä ʾәṭan mәslä ḫaragit kärbe…) (fols. 18r, l.13-18v, l.8) II-11) Prayer of incense – Intercessory prayer (Nәsebḥakä ʾәgziʾo lä-ʾaḫze kwullu ʾaläm…) (fols. 18v, l.8-23v, l.3) II-12) Prayer of Jeremy (Qәddus, qәddus, qәddus, ʾantä mäʿaza ṭәʿum…) (fols. 23v, l.4-24r, l.4) II-13) Prayer for chrism and incense (Näʾakkwәtäkä ʾabuhu lä-ʾәgziʾәnä…) (fols. 24, l.5-24r, l.16) II-14) Prayer for request (ʾƎgziʾabәḥer ʾәgziʾәyä ʾIyäsus Krәstos wä-mänfäs qәddus sәmaʿ ʾәgziʾo zäntä sәʾәläta…) (fols. 24r, l.17-24v, l.14) II-15) Prayer for the dead (ʾƎgziʾo gәbär täzkarä śänayä lä-ʾagbәrtikä…) (fols. 24v, l.14-25r, l.7) II-16) Prayer of incense - Prayer of thanksgiving (ʾAʾakkwәto wä-ʾaleʿәlo wä-ʾәsebbәḥo…) (fols. 25r, l.7-25v, l.4) II-17) Prayer of thanksgiving (ʾƎm-mәśraq wä-ʾәm-mәʿәrab yәtʾakkwät…) (fols. 25v, l.4-30r, l.1) III) Excerpt from the Gospel of Luke, 1:39-56 (fols. 30r, l.2-31r)
Additio 1.

copyists.copyist: Wäldä Muse is mentioned as the scribe in supplication formula, fol. 30r, l.1

donors.donor: Wäldä Giyorgis (?) (s. Additio 1); Wäldä ʾAnanya (?) (s. fol. 12v, l. 14).

dcomments.dcomment: Mention of King Yoḥannәs IV (r. 1872-89) in fols. 7r, 17v, 20v and mention of Metropolitan Ṗeṭros (in tenure 1881-1917) in fols. 8r, 15v and 21v.

txstates.txstate: Some folios damaged by rodents (e.g. fols. 16, 17, 26, 27, 30, 31). The sewing is damaged at the upper pair of sewing stations.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Holes close to the head (quire I).

squires.squire: I(11; s.l. 1, stub after 11/fols. 1r-11v) – II(10/fols. 12r-21v) – III(10/fols. 22r-31v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C Primary pricks are not visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donor, the King, and the Metropolitan; incipit of Text I and its subsections; Text II and its subsections; incipit of Text III; elements of punctuation; elements of Ethiopic numerals. In the incipit page of Text I, two lines are rubricated alternating with black lines (s. fol. 1r).

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I presents a collection of passages excerpted from the Missal (the Mäṣḥafä qәddase), which are read only by the assistant priest during the liturgy, as follows:
I-1) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 22-25) I-2) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 41-44.) I-3) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 56-60). I-4) Excerpt from the Liturgy of Catechumen (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 61-65). I-5) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 132-135). I-6) Excerpt from the Acts of the Apostles, Acts 23:1-11, transcription of a monition from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 148) I-7) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. III, §§ 194-209). I-8) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Word (MQ, Śәrʿatä qәddase, ch. IV, §§ 15-20). I-9) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 10-21). I-10) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 110-112). I-11) Excerpt from the Liturgy of the Eucharist, Anaphora of the Apostles (MQ, Qәddase zä-ḥawaryat, §§ 154-158).
Text II presents a collection of text mainly excerpted from the Ṣalotä ʿәṭan “Prayer of Incense” (published in 1951 E.C. (1958 AD.) in Addis Ababa). With the exception of the beginning of the work, the sequence of texts is very close to the one of Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan “Prayer of offering incense”, present at the end of the Vatican edition of the Maṣḥafä säʿatat “horologium” (published in 1945 E.C. (1952 AD.) in Rome), on p. 381-410. Here is the sequence of texts in Text II and their probable origin:
II-1) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 20-22. II-2) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 123. II-3) Supplication for offering the incense: excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 147. II-4) Prayer of incense: Undefined. II-5) Prayer of offering incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 383. II-6) Prayer of Incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 383-384; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 131. II-7) Monitions: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 384; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 131-132. II-8) Benediction: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 394; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 132. II-9) Prayer for the hierarchy: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 394-395; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 132-134. II-10) Prayer of offering incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 395-396; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 131. II-11) Prayer of incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 396-402; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 137-142. II-12) Prayer of Jeremy: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 402-403; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 142-143. II-13) Prayer for chrism and incense: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 403; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 152. II-14) Prayer for request: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 403-404; similar but not identical to Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 143 II-15) Prayer for the dead: similar but not identical to Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 143-144. II-16) Prayer of incense - Prayer of thanksgiving: excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 404; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 146. II-17) Prayer of thanksgiving : excerpt from Maṣḥafä säʿatat - Ṣalotä mäbaʾa ʿәṭan, p. 405-410; excerpt from Ṣalotä ʿәṭan, p. 147-152.

additional.cont: Fol. 31r, l.7: Unclear note (exhortation to the priests?)
additional.det: Mention of ʾAgamyo church; possibly also of the donor Wäldä Giyorgis.

frames.frame: Fol. 1r: Simple uncoloured horizontal ornamental band. Fol. 31r: Narrow coloured (black, red) horizontal ornamental band.
